thread.section_title: Le Bristol Paris - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: My best hotel in the world
thread.title_full: My best hotel in the world - Review of Le Bristol Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Anna2656
title: My best hotel in the world
text:
The location ,the management ,the maintenance ,the beauty the service and finally the food are top quality .
From checking in till checking out all staff is working with politeness , efficiency and a human touch.
I will recommend this hotels to my friends and definitely next time I am I Paris I will come back to Le Bristol .
Room Tip: I would recommend a room with view in the garden . It is so beautiful and calm. See more room tips
